text: Bruno Scipioni (July 29, 1934 - December 5, 2019) was an Italian actor. He was born in Rome. His best known roles were in Kapo, The Pizza Triangle and in La figliastra. Scipioni died on December 5, 2019 in Rome at the age of 85.RIP Bruno Scipioni ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1934 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Italian stage actors Category:Italian voice actors Category:Actors from Rome
title: Bruno Scipioni
